btrplace.plan

Class DefaultReconfigurationPlanMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.plan.DefaultReconfigurationPlanMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReconfigurationPlanMonitor

    public class DefaultReconfigurationPlanMonitor
extends Object
implements ReconfigurationPlanMonitor
    Simulated execution of a ReconfigurationPlan. The execution relies on the dependencies between the actions, retrieved using ReconfigurationPlan.getDirectDependencies(btrplace.plan.event.Action).

    The dependencies are updated each time an action is committed, which means the action have been successfully executed.

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      • commit

        public Set<Action> commit(Action a)
        Description copied from interface: ReconfigurationPlanMonitor
        Commit an action that was applyable. If it is theoretically possible to execute the action on the current model, the model is updated accordingly.
        Specified by:
        commit in interface ReconfigurationPlanMonitor
        Parameters:
        a - the action to commit
        Returns:
        a set of unblocked actions that may be empty if the operation succeed. null if the commit was not allowed because the action was not applyable

      • getNbCommitted

        Specified by:

        Returns:
